lexUnit.name: hectare.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a metric unit of square measure, equal to 10,000 square metres (2.471 acres)

sentence.text: Dr Roy Brown estimates that 12,000 hectares of moorland in the North York Moors National Park is not grazed intensively enough because farmers are reducing sheep flocks .
